Tools for IODA

This page is a running list of available tools for diffrenet use cases prepared for IODA steering commitee

Tool List

Creating Surveys

  • Google Forms
  • [Typeform] (http://www.typeform.com/)
  • SurveyMonkey

Storage

  • Dropbox
  • Google Drive
  • OneDrive

Remote communications

  • Zoom
  • Appear.in
  • Skype
  • Hangout

Online whiteboards

  • Realtimeboard
  • Stormboard
  • Deekit

github
